name: Reverb (Bad Brain)
description:
Using Leap Motion Technology, with your hands, guide your character in a sound reactive musical adventure. The experience is presentation focused, lasting as long as the song. Follow light and enjoy!

This is metaphorical experience,once you've failed, you're encouraged to start all over again. This means the game will close and you'll have to start fresh from the start.

The game starts suddenly and forces you to fail, but after a few attempts, you'll be mastering it;

Don't give up!
